source.2fe2e2af:
figure = plt.figure(figsize=(15,8))
  
sns.kdeplot(x=Black_Data["Age"],label="BLACK AGE")
sns.kdeplot(x=White_Data["Age"],label="WHITE AGE")
plt.legend(prop=dict(size=10))  
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

source.94a6b11f:
Data.index = Data["State"]
Data = Data.drop(["State","Date"],axis=1)
Data.index.name = None
source.8e5afbec:
Label_Func = LabelEncoder()

Data["Gender"] = Label_Func.fit_transform(Data["Gender"])
Data["Race"] = Label_Func.fit_transform(Data["Race"])
Data["City"] = Label_Func.fit_transform(Data["City"])
Data["Manner_of_death"] = Label_Func.fit_transform(Data["Manner_of_death"])
Data["Armed"] = Label_Func.fit_transform(Data["Armed"])
Data["Mental_illness"] = Label_Func.fit_transform(Data["Mental_illness"])
Data["Flee"] = Label_Func.fit_transform(Data["Flee"])

source.f96289eb:
# HISTORY

#### Content
In this dataset you will find a list of over 12,000 people who were shot dead by the police. Additionally, you will find more information about their name, race, gender, age, etc.
